rows.label: qev031202_MSG0001
rows.name:
Eep! Wh-what are you doing here?
You're not here for US, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0011
rows.name:
Tell Leroy that you're here to stop
his vile kidnapping scheme.

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Leroy what he's doing here.

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oh no! Did her father send you? He did, didn't he?!
Wh-what are we gonna do, Lavina?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0003
rows.name:
Er, we're...waiting! Just, uh...waiting for a friend.
Right, Lavina?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0004
rows.name: Yes. Waiting in very unsuspicious manner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0005
rows.name: So, um, what are you doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0006
rows.name:
...What? You're looking for Lavina? But this isn't...
It wasn't her father who sent you, was it?
Aw, Lavina! What are we gonna do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0007
rows.name:
Be calm. I will not part with you.
No matter what comes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0008
rows.name:
I don't know what my father told you.
But I choose to be here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now go. Leave us in peace.
Do not destroy our happiness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0031
rows.name: Attempt to figure out exactly what is going on.

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0040
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0041
rows.name: Try to convince Lavina to come back with you.

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0010
rows.name:
I love Leroy. This makes my father angry.
He does not want me to marry Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0011
rows.name:
He wants me to be mate of Wazdo Tygant.
But Wazdo Tygant is thug! I do not love him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0012
rows.name: So I left. Hid from clansmen here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0013
rows.name: Leroy is timid and meek. But I still love him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0014
rows.name: I will not leave him. I would leave my own limbs first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0015
rows.name:
Can I ask favor, Earth alien? Bring me ringstone.
Also sapphire horns taken from xiphias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0016
rows.name: Bring them to me. Then I will visit my father.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0017
rows.name:
Everything will end well if I have them.
And if Leroy has courage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0018
rows.name: ...I need what now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0019
rows.name: You know we cannot run forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0020
rows.name: You love me. But you must prove it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0021
rows.name: Er...prove it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG0022
rows.name:
We will speak once stone and horns are mine.
Trust me until then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG1001
rows.name:
Well, of course I'm gonna hide in a place like this.
Have you SEEN how big those Prone guys are?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG1002
rows.name:
Look, I didn't run off with Lavina because of some
childish whim. I did it because I love her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG1003
rows.name:
So If she says I need to prove my commitment,
I'll hike up my big-boy pants and do what I gotta do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2001
rows.name: Hey, you haven't seen Lavina around, have you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2002
rows.name: I went shopping for a minute, and now she's gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2003
rows.name:
You don't, uh... You don't think she got tired of me
and went home, do you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Leroy that seems extremely likely.

rows.label: qev031202_JNK0060
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev031202_SEL0061
rows.name:
Reassure Leroy that his special lady
friend hasn't abandoned him.

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2004
rows.name:
Do your friends ever tell you you're awfully...honest?
I was hoping for a little reassurance here.
Pretty little lies and all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2005
rows.name:
But even if she did, that's not gonna stop me!
She can dump me as many times as she likes—
I'll be right there every time to win her back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2006
rows.name:
Oh, did you happen to get the sapphire horns and
ringstone Lavina mentioned?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2007
rows.name: Thanks. You're really nice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2008
rows.name:
And you're right. The love we've got isn't something
that just disappears, so I'm not giving up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2009
rows.name:
Oh, hey—did you get the sapphire horns and
ringstone that Lavina was asking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2010
rows.name:
I'm afraid to head out there, but I've got to go find
Lavina. I want to get these to her as soon as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2011
rows.name:
Besides, I have a hunch where she might be.
There's a beach tucked away west of New LA...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG2012
rows.name:
If she's making some big decision, I'm sure I'll find her
waiting there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG3001
rows.name:
I want these people to be my family.
Not just Lavina, but her entire clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG3002
rows.name:
They all love her as much as I do. And if we agree
on that, there has to be more common ground.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG4001
rows.name:
Thanks for everything you've done. I don't think I could
have been strong through all this without your example.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG4002
rows.name:
I'm going to make her father accept me some day.
For starters, I'll focus on my job as a BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031202_MSG4003
rows.name:
That's the baseline measure of a man's character, right?
How he handles his career? Regardless, I'll do whatever
it takes to stay with her.[ST:wait ]
